mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_ID, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_PASS, u.USER_BIRTH, u.USER_GENDER, u.USER_HP, u.USER_EMAIL, u.USER_ZIP, u.USER_ADD1, u.USER_ADD2, u.USER_CLASS, u.USER_REG_DATE, u.USER_LOGIN, u.USER_OUT, pf.user_introduce AS user_introduce FROM USERS u, profile pf WHERE u.USER_OUT = 'N' AND u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.user_id = pf.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_PASS , USER_BIRTH , USER_GENDER , USER_HP , USER_EMAIL , USER_ZIP , USER_ADD1 , USER_ADD2 , USER_CLASS , USER_REG_DATE , USER_LOGIN , USER_OUT ) VALUES (#{userId} , #{userName} , #{userPass} , TO_DATE(#{userBirth},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{userGender}, #{userHp} , #{userEmail} , #{userZip} , #{userAdd1} , #{userAdd2} , 'C' , SYSDATE , 'N' , 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET USER_HP=#{userHp}, USER_EMAIL=#{userEmail}, USER_ZIP=#{userZip}, USER_ADD1=#{userAdd1}, USER_ADD2=#{userAdd2}, USER_UPDATE_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
